title: The Nu Html Checker args schema

--errors-only.description: Specifies that only error-level messages and non-document-error messages are reported (so that warnings and info messages are not reported).

--exit-zero-always.description: Makes the checker exit zero even if errors are reported for any documents.

--asciiquotes.description: Specifies whether ASCII quotation marks are substituted for Unicode smart quotation marks in messages.

--no-stream.description: Forces all documents to be be parsed in buffered mode instead of streaming mode (causes some parse errors to be treated as non-fatal document errors instead of as fatal document errors).

--html.description: Forces any *.xhtml or *.xht documents to be parsed using the HTML parser.

--skip-non-html.description: Skip documents that donâ€™t have *.html, *.htm, *.xhtml, or *.xht extensions.

--no-langdetect.description: Disables language detection, so that documents are not checked for missing or mislab led html[lang] attributes.

--verbose.description: Specifies "verbose" output. (Currently this just means that the names of files being checked are written to stdout.)
